name: Columns
description: The most versatile block. Use this for 'Features', 'Benefits', 'Text with Image', or generic layouts.

name: Cards
description: A grid of items. Use this for 'News', 'Products', 'Team Members', or 'Three-up' layouts.
structure: Single cell per card containing image and text.

name: Hero
description: The main banner at the top of the page. High impact visual.
structure: 2 columns: Image in Col 1, Text in Col 2 (or vice versa depending on CSS).

name: Accordion
description: Expandable/collapsible list. Use this for 'FAQs', 'Q&A', or hiding complex details.
structure: Each row is one item: Column 1 is the Question, Column 2 is the Answer.
